text: Sorry, I fell asleep ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. But wow, it was like I just read a beautiful piece of writing . Your eyes do tell a story, and honestly for me, itâ€™s hard to look people in the eyes because I find that so intimate lol, but if I really took the time to look someone in the eyes, Iâ€™d be able to tell if there is sadness, ambition, confidence, genuineness or happiness. And never feel any kind of envy when it comes to me. Thereâ€™s things about you that I know I couldnâ€™t have done in the past and actually still canâ€™t do. I donâ€™t think you fully know just how brave and gifted you really are. Also, donâ€™t feel ANY kind of discouragement about your passion. People donâ€™t find what they excel at until theyâ€™re in their 50s and they still become super successful, not to say it would take that long for you to find yours ğŸ˜‚. Iâ€™m glad you think my life is interesting, but I want to actually spice it up more. Thereâ€™s many things I havenâ€™t done yet. But whatever you wanna know, just know Iâ€™m an open book ğŸ¥°
